title: BlockDAG News in 2025 Tether Halts Uruguay Bitcoin Mining Operations as DeepSnitch AI's January Launch Could be the Biggest Profit Opportunity of 2026
description: Tether, the issuer of the world's largest stablecoin, USDT, has officially halted its Bitcoin mining operations in Uruguay, citing rising and uncompetitive energy costs. This move shows the growing challenges for infrastructure crypto projects. As miners face issues, investors are shifting focus to ...

title: Uruguay’s Enduring State: From Century-Old Consensus to Twenty-First Century Trials
description: Uruguay has sustained a robust statist profile since the early twentieth century. title: Mercosur: Who's for and who's against?
description:
After 25 years of negotiations, the EU-Mercosur trade agreement is closer than ever to being signed.

The agreement with the Mercosur bloc (including Argentina, Brazil, Paraguay and Uruguay) is part of the EU’s efforts to work around tariffs imposed by the Trump administration in the US.

In theory,...
